1: <pb/>Ix yalanxi Jehová d'a vin̈aj Moisés chi' icha tic:
2: <pb/>Al juntzan̈ checnab'il tic smasanil d'a eb' etisraelal: <pb/>A in Jehová e Diosal in.
3: Man̈ e b'eyb'alej sb'eyb'al eb' aj Egipto, aton jun chon̈ab' b'aj ec'nac ex cajan. <pb/>Man̈ e b'eyb'alejpax sb'eyb'al eb' aj Canaán, aton b'aj van ex vic'anb'ati.
4: <pb/>C'anab'ajejec in checnab'il, tze c'anab'ajan e b'eyb'alan in c'ayb'ub'al. A in ton Jehová e Diosal in svala'.
5: <pb/>B'eyb'alejec in checnab'il yed' in c'ayb'ub'al. A mach ol c'anab'ajanoc, ol schan̈ej sq'uinal yuuj. A in ton Jehová in svala'.
6: <pb/>Malajocab' junoc vin̈ vinac smulan yed' junoc ix ix to ayto yuj sb'a yed'oc. A inton Jehová in svala'.
7: <pb/>Malajocab' junoc mach syac' q'uixvelal smam, smulan yed' snun, yelxo val te chuc yujto snun ton val.
8: <pb/>Malajocab' junoc vin̈ vinac smulan yed' ix yetb'eyum smam yic max yac' q'uixvelal smam chi'.
9: <pb/>Malajocab' junoc vin̈ vinac smulan yed' yanab': Yanab' yuj smam, ma yuj snun, vach'chom d'a yol spat aljinac ix, mato ch'oc b'aj aljinac, man̈ smojoc smulan yed' ix.
10: <pb/>Malajocab' junoc vin̈ vinac syac' q'uixvelal sb'a smulan yed' ix yixchiquin, yixchiquin yuj yuninal, ma yuj yisil. Max yal-laj smulan yed'oc.
11: <pb/>Malajocab' junoc vin̈ vinac smulan yed' ix yune' ix yisil smam, yisil val smam chi', schab'il yanab' yaj ix, max yal-laj smulan yed' ix.
12: <pb/>Malajocab' junoc vin̈ vinac smulan yed' ix yanab' smam, yujto a' och smam chi' yed' ix.
13: <pb/>Malajocab' junoc vin̈ vinac smulan yed' ix snulej ix snun, yujto a' och ix snun vin̈ chi' yed' ix.
14: <pb/>Malajocab' junoc vin̈ vinac syac' q'uixvelal yuc'tac smam smulan yed' ix yetb'eyum vin̈, yujto ichato ayto yuj sb'a yed' ix.
15: <pb/>Malajocab' junoc vin̈ vinac smulan yed' ix yalib', yujto yetb'eyum ix vin̈ yuninal vin̈, max yal-laj smulan vin̈ yed' ix.
16: <pb/>Malajocab' junoc vin̈ vinac syac' q'uixvelal yuc'tac yuj smulan yed' ix yetb'eyum vin̈ yuc'tac chi'.
17: <pb/>Tato ay junoc vin̈ vinac tz'ic'an junoc ix ix, max yal-laj smulan vin̈ yed' ix yune' ix, to schab'il yisil yaj ix. Max yalpaxlaj smulan vin̈ yed' ix yixchiquin ix, yixchiquin yuj junoc vin̈ yune' ix, ma yuj junoc ix yune' ix. Yelxo val te chuc icha chi', yujto yicn̈ej ix yaj eb' chi'.
18: <pb/>Malajocab' junoc vin̈ vinac syic'q'ue snulej yetb'eyum, max yal-laj yic'ani yacb'an pitzanto ix yetb'eyum chi', yic vach' max och ajc'olal d'a scal eb' ix.
19: Malajocab' junoc vin̈ vinac ay tas sc'ulej yed' junoc ix ix ayic ayoch ix d'a stiempoal yic sb'isan uj.
20: <pb/>Malajocab' junoc vin̈ vinac smulan yed' ix yetb'eyum junocxo vinac, man̈ vach'oc scan eb' d'a yichan̈ ley.
21: <pb/>Malajocab' junoc vin̈ vinac sn̈usantz'a junoc yuninal silab'oc d'a jun comon dios scuchan Moloc. Tato sc'ulej icha chi', malaj velc'och d'a yol sat. A in Jehová in sval tic.
22: <pb/>Malajocab' junoc vin̈ vinac smulan yed' junoc yetvinaquil, icha sc'ulej yed' junoc ix ix, a jun chi' te yajb'entac.
23: <pb/>Malajocab' junoc vin̈ vinac smulan yed' noc' noc', malajocab' junoc mach syixtejb'at sb'a d'a icha chi'. Malajocab' pax junoc ix ix smulan yed' junoc noc' noc', yujto yelxo val man̈xo smojoc.
24: <pb/>Malajocab' mach syixtejb'at sb'a yed' juntzan̈ tic, yujto a d'a smasanil juntzan̈ tic, syixtejb'at sb'a juntzan̈ anima ol viq'uel d'a eyichan̈ tic.
25: Yuj juntzan̈ chi', man̈xo pax vach'oc yaj sluum eb', van vac'an yovalil d'a eb', van vac'an satjocpaxel eb' d'a sluum chi'.
26: Masanil juntzan̈ chi', sb'eyb'alej juntzan̈ anima cajan d'a jun luum chi', ayic manto ex c'och cajan a ex tic. Yuj chi' yelxo val man̈ vach'oc yaj jun luum chi' yuj eb'. Palta a ex israel ex tic yed' eb' ch'oc chon̈ab'il ayec' cajan d'a e cal, yovalil tze b'eyb'alej, tze c'anab'ajanpax in checnab'il tic. Man̈ e c'ulej masanil juntzan̈ tastac man̈ vach'oc sc'ulej eb' chi', yic vach' max ex satjipax el a ex tic d'a jun luum chi'.
29: A mach sb'eyb'alan juntzan̈ tastac yajb'entac chi', yovalil satjiel d'a e cal.
30: Yuj val chi' b'eyb'alejec in checnab'il, man̈ e b'eyb'alej juntzan̈ b'eyb'al yajb'entac chi', aton juntzan̈ sb'eyb'alaji ayic manto ex c'ochlaj ta', man̈ eyixtejb'at e b'a d'a icha chi'. A in Jehová e Diosal in svala', xchi Jehová d'a vin̈aj Moisés chi'.
